data.title: Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport
data.meta_description: Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport is 19 kilometers from Chengdu downtown. Check more about its guide, flights, facilities, transportation, and tips here to better plan a Chengdu trip.
data.text:
Brief Introduction of Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport

Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport is the major international airport serving Chengdu, as well as an important aviation hub to western China. For international tourists, Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport is a highly recommended gateway to Chengdu with its satisfying facilities, convenient transportation, and favorable visa policy. Since December 1, 2019, Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport implemented 144-hour visa-free transit policy that holders of passports issued by 53 countries do not need a visa to Chengdu through Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport.

Flights to Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport

Until September 2019, there are altogether 349 routes, 121 of which are international (regional) routes. It has access to 209 destinations and among them 131 are domestic cities. You can get to Chengdu by flight from most cities in China within 3h.

Travelers from Europe (Amsterdam, London, Madrid, Frankfurt, Moscow, Paris), Australia (Melbourne, Sydney), North America (New York, San-Francisco, Los Angeles, Vancouver), Africa (Port Louis, Mauritius), Middle East (Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Doha), East Asia (Seoul, Jeju Island, Tokyo, Osaka, Fukuoka, Kuala Lumpur, Singapore, Nha Trang, Hanoi, Danang, Bangkok, Suratthani, Phuket, Krabi, Chiang Mao, Saipan, Yangon, Siem Reap), Southeast Asia (Kathmandu, Colombo) and other regions (Hong Kong, Macau, Taipei, Taichung, Songshan, Kaohsiung), etc. can reach Chengdu directly by flight.

There are frequent flights connecting Chengdu and many hot destinations, such as San Francisco, Singapore, Melbourne, Kathmandu, Paris, Amsterdam, Bangkok, Kuala Lumpur, Seoul, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc.

And also, you can visit Chengdu by taking the non-scheduled flights from places including Sydney, Dubai, Frankfurt, Madrid, Moscow, and so on, which run 1 to 4 times per week.

Chengdu is well linked with the hot destinations including Beijing, Shanghai, Xian, Lhasa, Guilin, Jiuzhaigou, Guangzhou, Kunming, Lijiang, Zhangjiajie, Huangshan, Guiyang, Urumqi, Xiamen, Luoyang, Hohhot, Qingdao, Lanzhou, etc. Taking a flight from Chengdu to Lhasa is one of the most popular way to reach the holy Tibet.

>> 3 Days Classic Jiuzhaigou Tour by Flight from Chengdu

>> 6 Days Chengdu & Lhasa Highlights Tour by Flight

Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport Terminals

There are two terminals in Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport. They are about 800m away. You can either walk (about 10min) or take metro line 10 to transfer between them.

Terminal 1

Terminal 1 serves Sichuan Airlines (3U) and international (regional) airlines including EVA Airways (BR), Air China (CA), Dragon Air (KA), Air Macau (NX), Silk Air (MI), Singapore Airlines (SQ), Cathy Pacific (CX), United Airlines (UA), Shenzhen Airlines (ZH), Lucky Air (8L), Spring Airlines (9C), China Airliines (CI), Air Aisa X (D7), Nok Air (DD), Far Easter Air Transport (FE), HongKong Airlines (HX), KLM Royal Dutch Airlines (KL), Air Mauritius (MK), China Eastern (MU), ANA (NH), Vitnam Airlines (VN), Asiana Airlines (OZ), Bangkok Airways (PG), Qatar Airways (QR), Lao Airlines (QV), Thai Airways (TG), United Airlines (UA), etc.

Terminal 2

Terminal 2 serves domestic routes including Air China (CA), China Southern Airlines (CZ), China Eastern Airlines (MU), Shandong Airlines (SC), Tibetan Airlines (TV), Kunming Airlines (KY), Chengdu Airlines (EU), Xiamen Airlines (MF), Hainan Airlines (HU), Shenzhen Airlines (ZH), Lucky Air (8L), Yangtze River Airlines (Y8), Spring Airlines (9C), Okay Airways (BK), Ruili Airlines (DR), Donghai Airlines (DZ), Shanghai Airlines (FM), China Express Airlines (G5), Longair (GJ), Tianjin Airlines (GS), Juneyao Airlines (HO), Beijing Captal Airlines (JD), China United Airlines (KN), West Air (PN), Urumqi Air (UQ), etc.

Terminal Services

Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport Location & Transfer

Intercity High Speed Train

Chengdu-Mianyang-Leshan intercity railway has set up station at Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport that travelers can take this intercity high speed train to Chengdu East Railway Station, Chengdu South Railway Station, Leshan, Emeishan, Guanghan, Jiangyou, Mianyang, Deyang, Pengshan, Meishan, Jiajiang, etc.

Travelers can take C trains from Shuangliu Airport to visit Leshan Giant Buddha, Mount Emei, Sanxingdui Museum, Deyang Confucius Temple and the transfer will only need about 1 hour.

Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport Shuttle Bus

Note: The information above updated in March, 2020 is for your reference only. As the schedule of public transportation may change sometimes, please double check before your trip.

Scenic Shuttle Bus

144-Hour Transit Visa-free service of Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport facilitates tourists a lot no matter you go there specially or just make a transfer there. The Scenic Shuttle Bus can take you to Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding, Jinli Old Street, Wuhou Memorial Temple, Kuanzhai Alley, Dufu Thatched Cottage, Jinsha Site Museum, Sanxingdui Museum, Dujiangyan Irrigation System, Mount Qingcheng, etc. directly or with one transfer. As long as you have more than 10 hours' transfer time, it is possible to make a Chengdu tour.

Hotels near Chengdu Shuangliu Airport

Chengdu Homeland Hotel

Distance to Airport: 6 kilometers;

Address: No.181 Jichang Road, Chengdu

Chengdu Homeland Hotel is the 5-star luxury hotel situated halfway between the city and the airport. It has business room, deluxe king room, classic deluxe room, deluxe suite, classic deluxe room. The rooms are well-appointed and thoughtfully decorated. Besides, travelers can enjoy other facilities, like Western and Chinese restaurants, business center, laundry, beauty salon, swimming pool, tennis course, golf course, massage, sauna, gym, etc.

Chengdu Airport Hotel

Distance to Airport: 0.5 kilometer to T1 terminal;

Address: No.1 North Second Road, Shuangliu International Airport, Chengdu

Opened in 2013, Chengdu Airport Hotel is a 5-star hotel with 10 floors and 296 rooms. This hotel offers comfortable accommodation for travelers in transit. It has 6 kinds of rooms types, including deluxe standard room, business suite, deluxe executive suite, lingyun deluxe suite, deluxe king-bed room, etc. Hotel facilities include an indoor swimming pool, a spa center, a fitness center and a business center with meeting and banquet facilities, free WIFI and more.

Chengdu Chuangang International Hotel

Distance to Airport: 0.9 kilometer to T2 terminal;

Address:No.209 Lingang Road, middle section of Xihanggang Road, Shuangliu District, Chengdu

Chengdu Chuangang International Hotel is a 3 star hotel located very near to the airport. It is a nice choice for short stays. It has 10 floors with 150 rooms including single room, deluxe standard room, deluxe suite, etc. Other facilities include Chinese restaurant, free WIFI, free airport pick-up/off service, business center, multi-functional hall, tea room, etc.

To find more accommodation choices in Chengdu, please check top recommended Chengdu Hotels.

Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport Tips

Departure Procedure

Domestic Departures

Check-in: find check-in counter via flight information display system or terminal guide sign;

Security-check: Please prepare your boarding pass, valid certificate for security check;

Boarding: after security check, you can go to the corresponding lounge in accordance with the boarding gate indicated on your boarding pass.

International Departures

Check-in: find check-in counter via flight information display system or terminal guide sign;

Inspection & Quarantine

Customs

Immigration Inspection

Security Check: Please prepare your boarding pass, valid certificate for security check;

Boarding: after security check, you can go to the corresponding lounge in accordance with the boarding gate indicated in your boarding pass.

Check-in Time

The closing time for check-in domestic flight will be adjusted from 30 minutes before departure to 45 minutes before departure from October 25, 2015. Please arrange your time properly to catch your flight.

Luggage Restriction

Different airlines have slight differences in the regulation of baggage allowance, and there are also difference between the domestic flight and international flight. For more detailed luggage allowance, you can check Carry-on Luggage and Checked Luggage on our Travel Guide.
